snippet.title: I spent 10 years making 2D Minecraft!
snippet.description:
Ten years ago, I started making a Minecraft fan game. What a crazy journey this has been!

Play Mine Blocks: https://mineblocks.com/1

Correction: 0:13 The game was first released on "June 27, 2011," not "July 27, 2011." I simply put the wrong month name in my script, oops!

Playlist of update videos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lt4CzN1bImU&list=PLxAtsQccUE_3iAs5Bq4I5pIybw__H5M2u&index=1

Play old versions: https://mineblocks.com/1/classic
(Flash game emulation using Ruffle: https://ruffle.rs)

Mine Blocks on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Mine_Blocks
Zanzlanz on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Zanzlanz

History of Mine Blocks:
• Version history: https://mineblocks.com/1/wiki/index.php?title=Version_History
• First 30 days log: https://mineblocks.com/1/wiki/index.php?title=First_30_days
• Minute-by-minute log: https://pastebin.com/w9YpaJKT

Music in this video:
• "The Party Cactus" by Zanzlanz: https://soundcloud.com/zanzlanz/the-party-cactus
• "Break it. Place it." by gap: https://soundcloud.com/gapbrick/break-it-place-it
• "The Party Hat" by Zanzlanz: https://soundcloud.com/zanzlanz/the-party-hat

Other footage used:
• "Mineblock 2D - java - crafting (complete)" by orange451:
   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=H-3_OQuVTIE
• "Zelda Ocarina of Time Chicken Attack" by Depressed Seal:
   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SFRI3byJgYA
• "Mine Blocks #2 - Cranial Accessory" by IGP:
   https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mxJHusPWVWY

Thank you for an amazing 10 years! :)

#MineBlocks
